name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF THEATRE OWNERS (NATO)
description: Association for interests of American movie theatre owners.
sampleDescriptions: General lobbying on issues related to Relief for the movie theater industry related to the COVID-19 crisis.
Implementation of the CARES Act (H.R. 748); support for RESTART Act (S. 3814 & H.R. 7481); COVID-19 relief.

Lobbying on COVID-19 relief for motion picture theaters, generally, including the following specific bills:

Main Street Lending Program;
Paycheck Protection Program (PPP); and
RESTART Act (S. 3814 &
Lobbying on COVID-19 relief for motion picture theaters through S. 4258/H.R. 7806-The Save Our Stages Act.
